metadata.description: Specification Document Generator - A comprehensive skill for generating three interconnected specification documents with complete requirement traceability

plugins.name: specification-document-generator
plugins.description: Comprehensive skill for generating three interconnected specification documents (requirements.md, design.md, tasks.md) with complete requirement traceability using rigorous numbering systems and EARS notation. Supports large systems (100+ requirements) across various project types including software development, construction, manufacturing, and business processes.
